author: brusale
body:
#### PR description:

This PR enables the creation of CaloParticles in both ECAL and HCAL for Phase2. In addition, LayerCluster to CaloParticle and LayerCluster to SimCluster associations (described [here](https://hgcal.web.cern.ch/Validation/LayerClusterValidation/)) are introduced for the barrel region. Also, `namespace hgcal` has been changed into `namespace ticl`.

#### PR validation:

Tested on workflows `24896.0` and `24900.0`.

@felicepantaleo @rovere @thomreis @valsdav @bmarzocc @hatakeyamak
title: Enable CaloParticles in the barrel for Phase2 and introduce LC associations
